articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: China's Xi greets U.S. diplomat Blinken with power moves - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Secretary of state given cold shoulder, from seating to military talks
articles.content: BEIJING -- In his meeting with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken, Chinese President Xi Jinping took pains to project diplomatic strength, rebuffing calls to resume military dialogue and even phy… [+286 chars]
